PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09602018-06-27FIN, 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of ROBERT MALCOLM CAMPBELL, C.M., of Sackville, New Brunswick, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 29, 2020, in the place of Norman Bett, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
